name: Location
description: Location describes a physical location; e.g. an airport; a warehouse or a truck deck

columns.name: locationCodes
columns.description: Location code of airport; freight terminal; seaport; rail station. UN/LOCODE city code (5 letter) or IATA airport code (3 letter)

columns.name: onsiteActions
columns.description: References to the Actions happening at the Location

columns.name: subLocationOf
columns.description: Reference to the Location this is a Sublocation of

columns.name: subLocations
columns.description: References to Sublocations that describe the Location in more detail

columns.name: locationType
columns.description: Location type - e.g. Airport; Freight terminal; Rail station; Seaport; etc

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in
